title: Just A Little Taste
description: Braxton Hughes has seven days to complete his mission. His reputation is riding on his attention to detail and infallible focus. Not to mention the bet he has no intention of losing. There's no time for distractions. But then he meets beautiful Elise Savade. She quickly becomes a complication he can't afford...and a temptation he can't resist.ABOUT THIS BOOKContemporary Erotica (short story, wine, vineyard, heist)9,500 words
author: Selena Blake
